trans-unit.source: Represents controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controles que atuam como contêineres para uma coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: The children of this control support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref> and are organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed by row and column.
trans-unit.target: Os filhos deste controlam suporte <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"> </xref> e são organizados em um sistema de coordenadas lógico bidimensional que pode ser percorrido por linha e coluna.

trans-unit.source: GridPattern does not support active manipulation of a grid; the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern>control pattern is required for this functionality.
trans-unit.target: GridPattern não oferece suporte a manipulação ativa de uma grade; o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern>padrão de controle é necessária para essa funcionalidade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern>

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that may support this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [mapeamento de padrão de controle para clientes de automação de interface do usuário](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter exemplos de controles que podem dar suporte a esse padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está no cache.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que foi previamente especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref> that represents the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref> que representa a célula especificada.

trans-unit.source: Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0).
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas da grade são baseadas em zero com o superior esquerda (ou célula superior direita dependendo da localidade) tendo as coordenadas (0,0).

trans-unit.source: If a cell is empty, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is still returned in order to support retrieval of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid%2A> property for that cell.
trans-unit.target: Se uma célula estiver vazia, um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ainda será retornado para dar suporte à recuperação do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid%2A>propriedade daquela célula.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array as shown here.
trans-unit.target: Isso é possível quando o layout dos elementos filho na grade é semelhante a uma matriz irregular, conforme mostrado aqui.

trans-unit.source: ![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.")
trans-unit.target: ![Windows Explorer exibir mostrando desbalanceada layout. ] (~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Desbalanceada layout do Windows Explorer exibição mostrando.")

trans-unit.source: Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates
trans-unit.target: Exemplo de um controle de grade com coordenadas vazios

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
trans-unit.target: O número ordinal da linha de interesse.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the column of interest.
trans-unit.target: O número ordinal da coluna de interesse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref> that represents the retrieved cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref> que representa a célula recuperada.

trans-unit.source: The requested row coordinate is larger than the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount*> or the column coordinate is larger than the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.ColumnCount*>.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada da linha solicitada é maior do que o <> </> *> ou a coordenada da coluna é maior que o <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
